Credmark Community Update - November 2021

Momin Ahmad I 11.08.2021

November 2021

We hope you all enjoyed October!

Here’s the winning submission from our scariest DeFi meme Contest, from Discord user Bunch#2023.

Speaking of scary: it was a scary time in DeFi this month with the CREAM exploit and the sudden drop in Aave Liquidity causing the whole world to think about the tail risks of our most beloved DeFi Protocols

Credmark was right on time with our research with our new partners Coinshift and Yield App. Where did we publish our first round of research on the same dynamic that CREAM suffered from? Good Question!

Risk Library

We launched our Risk Library. We’re using this to define what models you’ll be able to see in our current and upcoming products (Risk Terminal, Smartpool, Credmark Protocol, etc.) as well as provide a comprehensive list of risks and terminology in DeFi.

For example: what percentage of TVL (Total Value Locked) did the CREAM exploit steal?

It depends on your definition of TVL.

If you consider the advertised TVL, it’s 1%. According to Coinmarketcap, we’re looking at 7%. If you take out leverage, it could be as higher than 20%!

When it comes to TVL, most apps sum all the borrows, lending, even market cap! But what about the reserves? And if we’re talking about LOCKED value, we’re talking about a protocol’s liabilities. What the hell is going on? Stay tuned to the risk library for answers.

The Credmark Risk Data Terminal

Check out our discord for Testnet access to the Credmark Data Protocol next week. We’ll announce mainnet dates later this month.

Conclusion of the Hackathon

Our hackathon has concluded with 17 participants submitting models! We’ll be backtesting them in 2 weeks against “Future” data in order to determine whose model was the most effective.

The winning model will be tested out on SmartPool and available for use soon!

Tokenomics

October saw record volumes for CMK. The highest since the launch in June!

The DAO is still in possession of 12.3M in discretionary spending.

We collected all the fees and put them into downside protection, as was voted on by our @credibleFriends role in the discord. If you’d like to become a credible friend, Have some CMK in your wallet and type !join in the #welcome channel!

Team

We’ve hired a new Head of Product: Matthias Knauth.

Matthias will lead our Product team as we expand into data solutions for risk management products. He brings a robust set of experience from Crypto and Financial services, as well as a deep technical knowledge. He’ll be ramping up this month, and we’ll have an announcement coming soon.
